TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DereferenceAlias extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: The DereferenceAlias enumeration specifies the process by which aliases are dereferenced.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DereferenceAlias Always = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Dereferences aliases when both searching subordinates and locating the base object of the search. The value is equal to 3.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DereferenceAlias FindingBaseObject = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Dereferences aliases when locating the base object, but not when searching its subordinates. The value is equal to 2.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DereferenceAlias InSearching = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Dereferences aliases when searching subordinates of the base object, but not when locating the base itself. The value is equal to 1.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DereferenceAlias Never = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Does not dereference aliases. The value is equal to 0.
